dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3835360V] Abuse
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Saturday, April 14, 2007 8:22 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3835360V] Abuse ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Abuse Added by system at Saturday, Apr 14 2007 02:22 am X-MailFrom: andysl@gmail.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Sat Apr 14 02:22:33 2007 Received: (qmail 31398 invoked by alias); 14 Apr 2007 07:22:33 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 31395 invoked from network); 14 Apr 2007 07:22:33 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 14 Apr 2007 07:22:33 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Sat, 14 Apr 2007 02:22:32 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Sat, 14 Apr 2007 02:22:33 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from andysl@gmail.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1Hccae-0001tG-Q2 for abuse@theplanet.com; Sat, 14 Apr 2007 02:22:32 -0500 Received: from an-out-0708.google.com ([209.85.132.251]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from andysl@gmail.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1Hccaa-000JmV-Qp for abuse@theplanet.com; Sat, 14 Apr 2007 02:22:28 -0500 Received: by an-out-0708.google.com with SMTP id b38so1136678ana for ; Sat, 14 Apr 2007 00:22:27 -0700 (PDT) DKIM-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=relaxed/relaxed; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=domainkey-signature:received:received:message-id:date:from:to:subject: mime-version:content-type; b=brRICD8MiIyuj56TJX2Ekg1HTlMQ6so3Njao0AtFAB9XoxwBjtQNzBId4kjGL0RMtc+mpQ vwHKZbOu1uamQnKSKLhue4WBrau0cDLi2L+a6gK4ZyC0hvfbbeoZlsJqKqySgoSMFkY1pWB5 DaImexviOgSGHEyJu07YC1cKSZCek= DomainKey-Signature: a=rsa-sha1; c=nofws; d=gmail.com; s=beta; h=received:message-id:date:from:to:subject:mime-version:content-type; b=sdEAGziZwBr0aVeyFuQb0o0gazzu+DhhQvQpiH5+ulGiVayYpUPFxlwX6NDxVG4CflZ/0I LII/fpPP487ucNsSHfv8GL85USEquRYSKRSrwlz7agc7V/zuUy1aRZrSbLh+uYvslTPBQ7Jx zv0YL+KQxNFVWBO0Xbezw2TbjVpyI= Received: by 10.100.178.7 with SMTP id a7mr3067652anf.1176535347358; Sat, 14 Apr 2007 00:22:27 -0700 (PDT) Received: by 10.100.174.5 with HTTP; Sat, 14 Apr 2007 00:22:27 -0700 (PDT) Message-ID: <99cef8c0704140022r1b536450k363b276df971e607@mail.gmail.com> Date: Sat, 14 Apr 2007 03:22:27 -0400 From: "Andrew Lee" To: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: Abuse MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_Part_19364_29196025.1176535347314" Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com designates 209.85.132.251 as permitted sender) client-ip=209.85.132.251; envelope-from=andysl@gmail.com; helo=an-out-0708.google.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 14 Apr 2007 07:22:33.0085 (UTC) FILETIME=[AB1B7AD0:01C77E65] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) The sales of intellectual properties owned by other entities is strictly prohibited on the "Internet." Please take care of this immediately - ITEMRATE.COM which is hosted on an IP in your datacenter. In addition, your company was notified of said abuse prior to this e-mail being written, and failed to act upon it accordingly. I hope that this is an isolated incident involving an employee who does not represent your company in the future. Negligence to act upon fraud/illegal activity is as illegal as the entity which engages directly within the activities. While your terms and agreements may void you from such liabilities from users' actions, if you are notified of said activities and do not act upon the removal of the illegal activies, then your company is as well as wrong as the original. Please handle this situation in a swift manner. Thank you. ** MIME element (text/html) The sales of intellectual properties owned by other entities is strictly prohibited on the "Internet."

Please take care of this immediately - ITEMRATE .COM which is hosted on an IP in your datacenter.

In addition, your company was notified of said abuse prior to this e-mail being written, and failed to act upon it accordingly .  I hope that this is an isolated incident involving an employee who does not represent your company in the future .  Negligence to act upon fraud/illegal activity is as illegal as the entity which engages directly within the activities.  While your  terms and agreements may void you from such liabilities from users' actions, if you are notified of said activities and do not act upon the removal of the illegal activies, then your company is as well as wrong as the  original .


Please handle this situation in a swift manner.

Thank you .
